verses.content: David chun Israel mihai laia thlang ṭhieu mi sîng thum ân khâwm nâwk a.
Chun, David chu a tho a, Juda rama Baala khuoa inthawkin cherub- hai chunga chuong sipaihai LALPA hming an inputtir Pathien bâwm chu zu la dingin a kuoma mi um po pohai le chun an inthawk tah a.
Chun, Pathien bâwm chu taw- lailîr tharah an sieh a, tlânga um Abinadab ina inthawk chun an lâk suok a, Abinadab naupasalhai Uzza le Ahio chun tawlailîr thar chu an khal a.
Chun, tlânga Abinadab ina inthawk chun, Pathien bâwm pum chun an lâk suok a; Ahio chu Pathien bâwm hma tieng chun a feh a.

Chun, David le Israel mi po pohai chun LALPA hmaah thil inri thei chi hran hran fâr thinga siem le, ṭing- ṭanghai dâm, perkhuonghai dâm, khuongtêhai dâm, tawtawrâwt bi neihai dâm, dârbenthekhai dâm an sut a.
Chun, Nakon hrizâwl an tlung chun Uzza chun Pathien bâwm chu a hei ban a, a chel a; sebâwng chu a pêm a pêm leiin.
Chun, LALPA lung chu Uzza chunga chun a sen ta thut a, a thil- thaw indik naw lei chun Pathienin chutaka chun a sukhlum tah a; Pathien bâwm kâwla chun a thi tah a.
Chun, LALPA chu Uzza chunga a hung ṭuong ta lei chun David chu a lunginsen a, chu hmun chu Perez- uzza ân bûk a; chu chu tu chen hin a la ni ta zing a.
Chu ni chun David chun LALPA chu a ṭih a, “Iengtin am LALPA bâwm hi ka kuom hung tlung thei a ta aw?” a ta.
Chuongchun, David chun David khuoa chun LALPA bâwm chu a kuomah a lâk nuom ta nawh a, David chun Git mi Obed-edom ina chun a sie ta lem a.
Chun, LALPA bâwm chu Git mi Obed-edom ina chun thla thum a um a, chuongchun, Obed-edom le a sûng- hai po po chu LALPAIN mal a sâwm a.

Chun, lal David chu, “Pathien bâwm leiin Obed-edom sûngkuo le a in le lo po po LALPAIN mal a sâwm a nih,” ti an hril a. Chuongchun, David chun Pathien bâwm chu Obed-edom ina inthawk chun David khuoa chun lâwmtakin a zu lâk tah a.
Chun, LALPA bâwm zâwntuhai chu pên ruk an fe phingleh se- bâwngchal le ran châwm thâuin an inthâwi a.
Chun, David chu a theitâwpin LALPA hmaah a lâm a, David chun puonzaiinhmi thiempu zakawsîng a hâk a.
Chuongchun, David le Israel mi po pohai chun khêk dur dur pum le tawtawrâwt mût ruoi ruoi pumin LALPA bâwm chu an lâk tah a.
Chun, LALPA bâwm chu David khuoa a lût lai chun Saula naunu Mikal chun tukvera inthawk hin a lo thlîr a; LALPA hmaa David lâm le inchâwm chu a zuk hmuh a, a hmusit lungril tah a.

Chuongchun, LALPA bâwm chu an lâk lût a, a siena dinga Davidin a zar, puon in sûnga a hmun dinga chun an sie tah a; chun, David chun pumrawhmang thilinhlân le inremna thilinhlân chu LALPA hmaa chun ân hlân a.
Chun, Davidin pumrawhmang thilinhlân le inremna thil inhlânhai ân hlân zo chun, sipaihai LALPA hmingin mipuihai chu mal a sâwm a.

Chun, mipui po po, Israel mi pumpuihai chu a nuhmei a pasalin mi tin el chu bei hlawm khat le sa tlin khat le grêp ra emṭâwl bâwr khat a sem seng a. Chuongchun, mi po po chu mâni in tieng an fe ta seng a.

Chuongchun, David chu a sûnghai malsâwm dingin a fe tah a. Chun, Saula naunu Mikal chu David tuok ding chun a hung suok a, “Vawisûna Israel lal chu a va ropui de! Mi hotak inzakna châng hre lo, ruoka um ang elin vawisûn khan a siehlaw nunghâkhai mithmuah ruok- in a um kha teh!” a lo tih a.
David chun Mikal kuoma chun, “I pa le a sûnghai po po aiah mi thlang a, LALPA mi Israelhai chunga lal dinga mi ruottu LALPA hmaah i sawnnaw, LALPA hmaa chu lâm âwm hrim ka nih.
Hieng nêk hmanin inzapui la um ka tih, kei le kei khawm lân sit pei bawk ka ta; amiruokchu, chuong sie- hlaw nunghâkhai i hrilhai chawi- mawi chun um ka tih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Saula naunu Mikal chun a thi chenin nau a nei ta nawh a.
